description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Enter the first creation from the minds of BadApps Games where the key to survival lies behind a simple door and the toughest enemy becomes yourself when not even death can save you.  Sometimes sleep is only the beginning.
